name: Numby hack
description: This is my most popular project. It is a minecraft mod, ment to be run with meteor on 1.19.2. While making this project, I learned a lot about how to organize code, along with writing goodreadable code.

name: Custom Chrome Tab
description: This is a chrome extension that allows the user to heavily customize the default chrome tab. This project, and all my other chrome extensions were intended to help me learn html and css.

name: Phoenix Anarchy Timeline
description: This is the first website I ever made. While making this website I learned how to create / host a website, how to create mobile compatible websites. My css skills also greatly improved while I was working on this project.

name: Learn Latin
description: This is a website I made to help me study for my Latin class. While making this website I learned React along with Flask, I also greatly improved my ability to write reusable code.
